summary:
Reaffirms relevant resolutions, including resolution 1251 (1999).

Expresses support for UNFICYP and extends its mandate until 31 July 2015.

Calls on both sides to engage with UNFICYP on buffer zone demarcation and the 1989 aide-memoire.

Calls on the Turkish Cypriot side and Turkish forces to restore the military status quo in Strovilia.

Calls on both sides to allow access to deminers and facilitate mine removal.

Requests the Secretary-General to report on implementation by 10 July 2015.

Welcomes UNFICYP's efforts to implement the zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse.

Decides to remain seized of the matter.
